thread.title: The Olympics Ramp Up Coed Competitions

author: Brian Costa
title: The Olympics Ramp Up Coed Competitions
text:
The International Olympic Committee wanted to add more women’s events, but it didn’t want to make the Olympics bigger. So it added remixes for athletes already going to the Games: coed team events.
This year’s Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang will include mixed-doubles curling and alpine team skiing, four years after the debut of mixed-gender events in biathlon, luge and figure skating.

They...
